content: this text is about a legal case that took place in harju county court the parties involved were not specified the court proceedings lasted for a year and seven months starting on an unspecified date and ending on december 13 2021 the court ruled that one party is responsible for covering the procedural costs but the exact amount was not mentioned the final resolution of the case was made by the court the case involves the sale of a joint ownership apartment property the property was sold at a public auction and the money received will be used to pay the costs of the auction and satisfy the claims of swedbank arising from a loan agreement the remaining money will be divided equally between the parties involved each party is responsible for their own procedural costs and any procedural aid granted by the state will be borne by the republic of estonia the court will determine the lawyers fee separately the decision of the court can be appealed within 30 days to the tallinn district court the appeal can be resolved in writing or through a hearing depending on the appellants request procedural aid can be applied for to cover the costs of the proceedings the claimant must perform a procedural action such as filing a complaint to substantiate their request for procedural aid the court will grant a reasonable time limit to resolve the request the deadline for the procedural action should not be extended without valid grounds the text also mentions the circumstances of the claim and any objections or counterclaims the claimant filed a lawsuit against the defendant in court seeking to divide the common property or find an alternative way to distribute it the claimant is also seeking compensation for the use of the property and a declaration of intent to change the owners entry in the land register the parties got married in 2004 and their marriage was dissolved in 2020 they acquired an apartment property during their marriage the claimant has moved out of the shared apartment with their child while the defendant is currently living in the apartment and has refused to share ownership the claimant has requested compensation for the exclusive use of the apartment but the defendant has also refused the claimant has asked for sole ownership of the apartment or for the joint ownership to be divided the parties have been in dispute since 2020 and the claimant believes that the defendants claims are unfounded the court will evaluate the evidence and make a judgment based on the circumstances and claims presented by the parties the court will also consider the division of joint assets according to the family law act the court finds that the loan payments should be transferred to the claimants bank account as agreed upon by the parties the court suggests selling the apartment through a public auction to fulfill the loan obligation and divide the remaining money equally between the parties the claimant is entitled to demand a monthly compensation of 150 euros from the defendant for the use of the apartment in summary the court has made a resolution in a legal case involving the sale of a joint ownership apartment property the court ruled on the division of assets loan obligations and compensation for the use of the apartment the parties are responsible for their own procedural costs and any aid granted by the state will be borne by the republic of estonia the decision can be appealed within 30 days
